"Procurement of meat from matured Agnis":
"I think the freshness and the tenderness of
the meat are important. But, sometimes I
think that the tastiness can also be drawn out
from the meat of toned animals.
As a detour for the purpose of mastering the
food, first and foremost, could you procure
the meat of the matured Agnis?

*Target Agnis of Lv.60 and higher"
"老成したアギニスの肉の調達"

"お肉の鮮度や柔らかさは重要だと思うの。
でも、時には鍛え抜かれた動物の肉も
美味しさを引き出せるかなーって。

食を極めるための寄り道の一歩として
まずは老成したアギニスのお肉を
調達してもらえないかしら？

※Lv.60～のアギニスが対象"
